DOC.brief_summary: A single arm , prospective multicenter non-randomized pivotal clinical trial evaluate 20mm Edwards SAPIEN XT™ transcatheter heart valve ( model 9300TFX ) , NovaFlex™ transfemoral delivery system , crimper accessory . The trial include premarket pivotal cohort evaluate system performance well post market clinical follow-up phase involve long term follow-up patient evaluate safety investigational device 5 year .
DOC.brief_title: PREVAIL-20J - Transfemoral Placement 20mm Aortic Balloon Expandable Transcatheter Valve Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : To evaluate safety efficacy THV-9300 ( 20mm ) patient severe symptomatic aortic stenosis attribute calcification degeneration valve leaflet undergo surgery safely would difficult . Enrollment : 15 patient ( No.of patient need : 12 ) Follow-up : Subject data collection include clinical information baseline index procedure . Subjects undergo clinical follow-up discharge , 30 day , 6 month annually 5 year . Clinical site : 1 ) Osaka University Hospital , 2 ) Kurashiki Central Hospital , 3 ) Sakakibara Heart Institute , 4 ) Kokura Memorial Hospital
